title: Home Equity Decision
description: Evaluate whether to keep, rent, sell or leverage equity in {NAME_POS} home to fund care

sections.title: Home Equity Decision
sections.help_text: This assessment helps you understand whether to keep, rent, sell or leverage the equity in your home to fund care. Answer only the questions that apply - skip any you don't know.

fields.label: Does {NAME_POS} own a home?
fields.help: Select 'Yes' if {NAME_POS} owns a primary residence

fields.label: Current market value of the home
fields.help: Estimated current market value of the home

fields.label: Remaining mortgage balance
fields.help: Total amount left on the mortgage (0 if paid off)

fields.label: Monthly carrying costs
fields.help: Total monthly costs for taxes, insurance, HOA, maintenance, and utilities

fields.label: Potential monthly rental income
fields.help: Approximate monthly rent the home could generate if rented out

fields.label: Estimated monthly cost of care
fields.help: Monthly cost from the care plan recommendation (optional - if known)

fields.label: Expected duration of care (months)
fields.help: Approximate number of months care will be needed (e.g., 24 for 2 years)

fields.label: Is returning to the home after care a priority?

options.label: Yes - prefer to keep the home

fields.help: Whether maintaining ownership is important for future return

fields.label: Which strategies would you like to evaluate?

options.label: Keep the home (maintain ownership, no additional funding)
Rent the home (generate income while maintaining ownership)
Sell the home (liquidate equity for care funding)

fields.help: Select all strategies you want to compare (check at least one)
